properties.headline: Air Quality Alert issued January 23 at 3:52PM EST by NWS Burlington VT
properties.description:
An Air Quality Alert is from 7 PM this evening to 11 PM EST Friday.

The Vermont Agency of Natural Resources has issued an Air Quality
Health Advisory for the following counties in Vermont...

Rutland County.

Stagnant air conditions have resulted in significant air pollutant
accumulation which is expected to exceed the 24 hour standard for
fine particulate matter in some locations across the state on
Friday, such as Rutland City. Note that similarly polluted conditions
will exist in other portions of the state where population centers
are located in valleys, such as along the Connecticut river, and
mountain valleys such as the Barre-Montpelier area.

Exposure to elevated levels of fine particles can increase the
likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive individuals, and may
aggravate heart or lung disease in persons with cardiopulmonary
disease and the elderly.

An Air Quality Action Day means that particulate concentrations
within the region may approach or exceed unhealthy standards.

For additional information...please visit the Vermont Agency of
Natural Resources web site at...

http://www.anr.state.vt.us/air/index.htm.

NWSheadline: AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM EST FRIDAY
